org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.alt

Class AAConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.alt.AAConverter

  • public class AAConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to do conversions between different alternating automata, or between alternating automaton and finite automaton.
    Author:
    Yi-Wen Chang, ported by Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Method Detail

      • CNFABW2NBW

        public static FSA CNFABW2NBW(AltAutomaton abw)
        Converts an alternating Büchi word automaton in CNF to an equivalent Büchi word automaton.
        Parameters:
        abw - an alternating Büchi word automaton in CNF to be converted
        Returns:
        a Büchi word automaton equivalent to abw

      • CNFABW2NBW

        public static FSA CNFABW2NBW(AltAutomaton abw,
                             java.util.Hashtable<State,Pair<State,java.lang.Integer>> table)
        Converts an alternating Büchi word automaton in CNF to an equivalent Büchi word automaton.
        Parameters:
        abw - an alternating Büchi word automaton in CNF to be converted
        table - a hash table mapping a state in abw to a state in a universal co-Büchi word automaton and its rank during the conversion from the universal co-Büchi word automaton to abw
        Returns:
        a Büchi word automaton equivalent to abw
